verses.name: Mark 13:24
verses.text: But in those days, after that tribulation, the sun shall be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light,

verses.name: Mark 13:25
verses.text: And the stars of heaven shall fall, and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken.

verses.name: Mark 13:26
verses.text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory.

verses.name: Mark 13:27
verses.text: And then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven.
